title: Need players for tournament TOMORROW!
body:
hey guys, Sumsoc premade 5v5 tournament is on tomorrow starting at 11am, and i was looking for a top and jng/mid laner (ill play either mid/jng) to come play not only for fun but for a chance to win!! (Diamond adc, plat support, and diamond mid/jng)

If your interested Add me on league "Verns" and please don't hesitate to ask :P 1st in best dressed after all <3

replies.body:
hey mate
Keen as a been
DV ARJAY 
Top main 
Plat 5 but kinda stuck there rn
I can play top/mid/jg if you like and would gladly play with you. gabepasta and Oce.
